channel.title: Torn - Divine Cosmos
channel.description: Torn finally returns. We have left for a few months to go into a beta stage that I only allowed 20 dedicated testers have access to. Now we are back, and with a whole new realm, and idea. The graphics, unbeatable. The social interaction and community, undeniable. The economy, flawless. This is TORN, with 2 worlds. World 1 - Training and Pking World 2 - Minigames. We have launched a new minigame called: THE DIVINE COSMOS. The object? Simple. Collect points. As the master control panel in tron said: End of Line.

item.title: Torn - Divine Cosmos
item.dc:creator: @TornRsPs TornRsPs
item.description:
@TornRsPs wrote:

Torn finally returns. We have left for a few months to go into a beta stage that I only allowed
20 dedicated testers have access to. Now we are back, and with a whole new realm, and
idea. The graphics, unbeatable. The social interaction and community, undeniable. The
economy, flawless. This is TORN, with 2 worlds. World 1 - Training and Pking
World 2 - Minigames. We have launched a new minigame called: THE DIVINE COSMOS.
The object? Simple. Collect points. As the master control panel in tron said: End of Line.
